cards.rules_text: The owner of target spell, nonland permanent or card in a graveyard puts it on the top or bottom of their library.

Choose three. You may choose the same mode more than once.
• Proliferate. [i](Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)[/i]
• Target creature phases out. [i](Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist until its controller's next turn.)[/i]
• Counter target activated or triggered ability.

Flash
Enchant white or blue creature you control
[i]Aegis Shield[/i] — When this Aura enters, enchanted creature gains hexproof and indestructible until end of turn. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you or creatures you control this turn.
[i]Swipe of Sword[/i] — Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying and vigilance.

Flash
Enchant green or white creature you control
[i]“Power!”[/i] — Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has reach and vigilance.
[i]“Give me more power!” — [/i]When this Aura enters, enchanted creature gains hexproof and indestructible until end of turn. Return up to one Aura card from a graveyard to the battlefield attached to that creature.
cards.notes:
Patched

Helpful Note: If you copy this card onto a Citizen with Kyrie's "Hymn to Sparda," then you will have to sacrifice either the original or the copy to the "legend rule." ...but you will still trigger "Give me more power!" on both of them, giving both of them an Aura from a graveyard.

cards.rules_text:
[+2]: Gain two Stylish Ranks. 
[-2]: Add up to X mana of different colors, where X is your number of Stylish Ranks.
[-10]: Each opponent chooses half of the nontoken permanents they control. Gain control of those permanents.
